What are you waiting for?

How to get there.

The event will be held at Aller in Punavuori. Tram 1A takes you right to the front door, or you may take the tram 6 to the end of Bulevardi and walk 500 meters past Nosturi.

  • Pursimiehenkatu 29 A, Helsinki
  • Conference room, 5th floor
  • Follow the signs :)

Sign up!

Participation

To attend you must sign yourself up at the HelsinkiJS May 2017 Meetabit page. Sign up before we're full!

Wanna talk about your work?

Go to the HelsinkiJS HelsinkiJS Meetabit page and propose a talk!

AfterJS

For the mingle-minded, potentially social, networkingesque or the otherwise spirited among of us, please join us in our sauna after the event.
